title: NB1810-LpWac4Ep-G
description: High-performance and modular mobile router with Gigabit Ethernet and SFP ports plus WiFi radio for use in an industrial environment.
heroText: High-performance and modular mobile router with Gigabit Ethernet and SFP port for Condition Monitoring, Automation and Remote Management applications
overview: NB1810-LpWac4Ep-G provides fast Internet access in an industrial environment. For a reliable network connection, the device has a GSM module with 4G-LTE-A Pro support. It has a WiFi-5 supporting radio, four-port Gigabit Ethernet switch and a configurable SFP/GbE port, as well as a USB port and a serial interface that can be operated in RS-232/485 modes.
The high-quality metal housing for DIN rail mounting offers the required ruggedness for use in industrial environments with a supported temperature range of -40 °C to +70 °C.

The software is based on proven components, including a built-in Linux operating system and a powerful communications protocol suite, as well as VPN technologies such as OpenVPN. Customer-specific software extensions can be implemented via an advanced SDK.
keyFeatures: LTE-A Pro represents a more advanced and capable iteration of LTE, delivering significantly faster speeds, lower latency and improved network efficiency. In an environment where LTE is still widely used, LTE-A Pro serves as an important step in meeting growing demands for faster and more reliable wireless connectivity.

One radio that supports WLAN-ac allows creating a wireless local area network (WLAN, WiFi) and connecting as a client to other available WiFi access points. It can be operated at different frequencies (2.4 GHz and 5GHz).
With its IP40 level protected design, it is resistant to harsh physical conditions. It operates between -40°C and +70°C.
Advanced GPS receiver makes it easy to determine the vehicle's geographic location information with high accuracy. Up to three satellites can be fixed for high accuracy in positioning.

wifi.dataTransferRate: 144 Mbps 2.4 GHz 2x2 MIMO, 150 Mbps 5 GHz SISO

rs485.signalLevels: Differential output voltage, loaded 1.5 VDC – 3.6 VDC
rs485.termination: 120 Ω for RS-485 configurable by software

system.core: 1x 1.3 GHz dual-core, 1024 MB RAM, 4 GB Flash

licenses.gnss: GNSS location services, JSON and NMEA stream server

power.inputVoltage: Nominal (12, 24, 48 VDC), Absolute (12 VDC to 24 VDC (± 25%) )
